name: nuclear power plant construction, pressure water reactor 650MW | nuclear power plant, pressure water reactor, 650MW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11406/documentation

This dataset represents the construction of a pressure water nuclear plant in Quebec.This dataset is based on study on the production, transport and distribution of electricity in Quebec. It represents the only nuclear plant that belong to Hydro-Quebec, which is the main electricity provider in the region (about 95% of the total electricity produced). ;The CANDU (CANada Deuterium Uranium) technology was used to built this nuclear power plant. This nuclear technology is characterized by the use of heavy water as moderator and natural uranium as fuel.;;Source: http://www.candu.com/en/home/default.aspx;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From land transformation and construction operations.

The activity ends with the dismantling of the plant after use.
This datasets includes:
- the most important materials used for the construction of the plant and the associated infrastructures: cement, gravel, steel, copper, lead, aluminium;
- operations and machinery for construction
- and use;
- decommissioning and waste treatment
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Between 1982 and 2012 but assumed to be equivalent to present construction (energy, explosives and opérations)
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Data refer to Gentilly-2 nuclear power plant, the only nuclear facility in Quebec. The Gentilly-2 CANDU pressurized heavy water reactor (PHWR) has a gross output of 675 MWe.;The nuclear plant includes as main components:;-CANDU reactor;-Moderator system;-Heat transport system;-Turbine generator system;-Reactor regulator system;-Management systems (water, heavy water, liquid wastes, gas effluents);-Spent fuel stockage;-Solid radioactive wastes stockage;-Energy systems (auxiliary system, batteries, etc.);-Buildings
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Extrapolation of construction activities based on ecoinvent datasets.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data collection from the company including all its activities
